name: Lace Base Closures
description:
All of Our lace base closures are reinforced at the perimeter to prevent tearing, and to also ensure that you have a firm and secure base to sew on to. (specify texture at checkout).

Hair Color: Natural Black or Natural Brown

Texture: Body Wave, Straight, Deep Wave, Loose Wave, Curly

Lace: Swiss Lace Light brown

PLEASE NOTE: Knots are not pre-sealed or bleached on lace closures - to ensure no shedding or thinning you may seal your knots with "TDI Knot Sealer" or  "Walker Top Knot".

name: Top selling! Naked Brazilian Hair
description:
Type: Naked Virgin Brazilian Hair (specify texture during checkout).

Texture: Body Wave, Straight, Deep Wave, Loose Wave, Curly

Color: 1B or Natural Black

Weight: 3.5 oz

We are extremely proud to introduce to you our new premium line of naked virgin hair! 

Our hair is 100% naked virgin hair, making it of great unmatched quality when compared to other types of hair. This is one of our best selling textures.

Our Brazilian Virgin Hair is very versatile. It blends in quite undetectably with your own hair or used on its own in a full wig or sew in.

This 100% human hair is in its virgin form 
(natural dark color 1b) making it easy to color without degrading the quality of the hair.

-3.5 oz each bundle 
-Comes from one donor, not mixed 
-100% unprocessed virgin temple hair 
-Reinforced wefts 
-Machine-made wefts 
-Tangle free 
-Healthy shine 
-Endless styling options 
-All cuticles are in the same direction
-Our naked virgin hair comes in natural 1B or Natural Black

Note: 2-3 bundles are needed for a full head of hair depending on the length and desired volume.

PLEASE NOTE: WEFTS ARE NOT PRE-SEALED - to ensure no shedding you may seal wefts with "Fray Check"

name: Top Selling! Naked Peruvian Hair
description:
Type: Naked Virgin Peruvian Hair (specify texture during checkout).

Color: Natural Black or Natural Brown

Texture: Body Wave, Straight, Deep Wave, Loose Wave, Curly





Weight: 3.5 oz
 

We are extremely proud to introduce to you our new premium line of naked virgin hair! 

Our hair is 100% naked virgin hair, making it of great unmatched quality when compared to other types of hair. This is one of our best selling textures.

Our Naked Peruvian Hair is very rare and is considered a Premium Luxury Virgin Hair

This hair is considered a luxury product because of its difficulty to obtain. It is very soft, fine, and light weight in texture, and has a very beautiful luster to it.

Peruvian Virgin Hair is very versatile. It blends in quite undetectably with your own hair or used on its own in a full wig or sew in.


This 100% human hair is in its virgin form 
(natural dark color 1b) making it easy to color without degrading the quality of the hair.

-3.5 oz each bundle 
-Comes from one donor, not mixed 
-100% naked virgin temple hair 
-Reinforced wefts 
-Machine-made wefts 
-Tangle free 
-Healthy shine 
-Endless styling options 
-All cuticles are in the same direction
-Hair starts completely virgin in natural colors ( #1B )

Note: 2-3 bundles are needed for a full head of hair depending on the length and desired volume.

PLEASE NOTE: WEFTS ARE NOT PRE-SEALED - to ensure no shedding you may seal wefts with "Fray Check"
